item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - The.Scream.Team.2002.480p.DSNP.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
The Scream Team

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Poster | Key Art


2002 • 1h 28m
Comedy, Fantasy

Description
Ian and Claire Carlyle accompany their father to his childhood home for the funeral of their Grandpa Frank. As the town prepares for its Halloween Festival, the kids discover that ghosts really do exist!
Click to expand...
Trailers
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
With Halloween looming, Ian and Claire Carlyle accompany their father to his childhood hometown of Steeple Falls for the funeral of their beloved Grandpa Frank. As the small town prepares for its Halloween Festival, marking the legend of Zachariah Kull, Ian and Claire are startled to discover that ghosts really do exist! Worse, they learn that the angry spirit of Zachariah Kull won't allow their late grandfather's soul to rest.
Duration: 1h 28m
Release Date: 2002
Genre: Comedy, Fantasy
Rating:
Director: Stuart Gillard
Starring: Mark Rendall, Kat Dennings, Robert Bockstael, Eric Idle, Tommy Davidson, Gary Reineke
Click to expand...
